categories: Category:Alliance to Restore the Republic organizations

nodes.text: The Rebel Four were a small Rebel Alliance group consisting of four members: Falaem Onn, Grimgrim, Soo Rcharrz, and their leader, F4-MF.

On a mission to Vatleria, the Rebel Four attacked an Imperial stronghold. However, unbeknownst to the group, this was a trap set by Darth Vader. The group was attacked by an array of traps set by the Imperial and did not survive the mission.

The Rebel Four is a parody of the Fantastic Four. All the members died with a death that resembled their superhero counterparts. Each team member was reminiscent of a Fantastic Four member, F4-MF being a parody of Reed Richards, also known as Mr.Fantastic; Grimgrim being a parody of the Thing; Falaem Onn being a parody of the Human Torch; and Soo Rcharrz being a parallel to Sue Richards, also known as the Invisible Woman.
